original_text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week, he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, out of whom he had cast seven devils.
korean_text: [예수께서 안식 후 첫날 이른 아침에 살아나신 후 전에 일곱 귀신을 쫓아내어 주신 막달라 마리아에게 먼저 보이시니

sentences.original_text: Now when Jesus was risen early
he appeared first to Mary Magdalene
out of whom he had cast seven devils
